scripts.fulldb: npm run typegen && npm run backend-snapshot && npm run gen:rpc && npm run gen:policies && npm run rpcmap && npm run funcgen
scripts.funcgen: node -r dotenv/config -e "const { execSync } = require('child_process'); const dbUrl = process.env.SUPABASE_DB_URL; if (!dbUrl) { console.error('ERROR: DATABASE_URL not set in .env file.'); process.exit(1); } const cmd = `pg_dump \"${dbUrl}\" --schema=public --section=pre-data --section=post-data --no-owner --no-privileges --no-tablespaces --no-unlogged-table-data --no-comments --file=src/lib/functions.sql --verbose`; execSync(cmd, { stdio: 'inherit', env: process.env });"
scripts.audit:supabase:security: node scripts/supabase_audit.mjs --in audits/supabase --out audits/supabase/supabase_audit.md --only security --top 20 --format both
scripts.audit:supabase:perf: node scripts/supabase_audit.mjs --in audits/supabase --out audits/supabase/supabase_audit.md --only performance --top 20 --format both
scripts.audit:supabase:queries: node scripts/supabase_audit.mjs --in audits/supabase --out audits/supabase/supabase_audit.md --only queries --top 20 --format both
scripts.audit:all: npm run audit:deps && npm run audit:supabase:collect && npm run audit:supabase
